description.english: Perform Super Strike for the first time.
description.french: Utiliser Super impact pour la première fois
description.schinese: 第一次触发超级冲击
description.tchinese: 第一次觸發超級衝擊
description.japanese: スーパーストライクを始めて発動する
description.brazilian: Ativar o Super Impacto pela primeira vez

displayName.japanese: スピリットダッシュ·カウンター

description.english: Perform Spirit Dash and the following counterattack for the first time.
description.french: Utiliser Glissade divine et la contre-attaque qui s'ensuit pour la première fois
description.schinese: 第一次触发灵光滑步以及后续的反击
description.tchinese: 第一次觸發靈光滑步以及後續的反擊
description.japanese: スピリットダッシュ·カウンターを始めて発動する
description.brazilian: Ativar o Deslize Espiritual e o contra-ataque subsequente pela primeira vez

description.english: Perform Instant Counter for the first time.
description.french: Utiliser Contre-attaque éclair pour la première fois

description.tchinese: 第一次觸發一閃反擊

description.english: Perform Spirit Mimicry and Spirit Release for the first time.
description.french: Utiliser Poing spirituel camouflé et le Poing spirituel
description.schinese: 第一次触发灵拳拟态并完成灵拳释放
description.tchinese: 第一次觸發靈拳擬態並完成靈拳釋放
description.japanese: 霊拳擬態と霊拳インパクトを始めて発動する
description.brazilian: Ativar a Mimetismo Espiritual e liberar o Punho Espiritual pela primeira vez

description.english: Defeat Stone Kai in chapter three.
description.french: Vaincre Kai de pierre dans le chapitre 3

description.english: Successfully achieve a 100‑hit combo (excluding Practice Mode).

description.english: First time achieving S rank in a level (also unlocks if a higher rank is achieved).
description.french: Obtenir une note S pour la première fois (les notes supérieures sont débloquées ensemble)

description.tchinese: 第一次獲得關卡S級評價（更高評價一同解鎖）

description.tchinese: 靈力值達到最大值

description.french: Terminer la difficulté Apprenti (les difficultés supérieures sont débloquées ensemble)

description.english: Complete Master difficulty (also unlocks if completed on a higher difficulty).

description.english: Complete Grandmaster difficulty (also unlocks if completed on a higher difficulty).

description.tchinese: 通關繼承者難度
description.japanese: 継承者難易度をクリア

description.english: Achieve SSS rank for every chapter (any difficulty).
description.french: Obtenir une note SSS pour tous les chapitres (difficulté au choix)
description.schinese: 任意难度所有章节获得SSS级评价
description.tchinese: 任意難度所有章節獲得SSS級評價
description.japanese: 全章でSSS評価を獲得（難易度不問）​
description.brazilian: Obter avaliação Rank SSS em todos os capítulos em qualquer dificuldade

description.english: Achieve SSS‑Rank in Inheritor difficulty for every chapter.
description.french: Obtenir une note SSS pour tous les chapitres (difficulté successeur)
description.schinese: 继承者难度所有章节获得SSS级评价
description.tchinese: 繼承者難度所有章節獲得SSS級評價
description.japanese: 継承者難易度の全章でSSS評価を獲得
description.brazilian: Obter avaliação Rank SSS em todos os capítulos na dificuldade Sucessor

description.english: Clear the True Self Arena (any difficulty).
description.french: Terminer l’Arène du Vrai Moi (n’importe quelle difficulté)
description.schinese: 成功通关真我竞技场（任意难度）
description.tchinese: 成功通關真我競技場（任意難度）
description.japanese: 真我競技場を成功クリア（任意難易度）

description.english: Clear the True Self Arena without failing (any difficulty).
description.french: Terminer l’Arène du Vrai Moi sans subir d’échec (n’importe quelle difficulté)
description.schinese: 一次不失败地通关真我竞技场（任意难度）
description.tchinese: 一次不失敗地通關真我競技場（任意難度）
description.japanese: 真我競技場を一度も失敗せずにクリア（任意難易度）
description.brazilian: Concluir a Arena do Verdadeiro Eu sem falhar (qualquer dificuldade)

description.english: Achieve SSS Final Score in the True Self Arena (any difficulty).
description.french: Obtenir la note finale SSS dans l’Arène du Vrai Moi (n’importe quelle difficulté)
description.schinese: 获得真我竞技场SSS最终评分（任意难度）
description.tchinese: 獲得真我競技場SSS最終評分（任意難度）
